In addition to using a Quarto Website for reporting and communication purposes, 
it would also be nice to utilize __Closeread__, a Quarto extension to create scrollytelling stories with HTML documents.

The official website of Closeread is: <br>
<a href="https://closeread.dev/" target="_blank">https://closeread.dev</a>

A companion website to learn Closeread is: <br>
<a href="https://www.gastonsanchez.com/learn-closeread/" target="_blank">https://www.gastonsanchez.com/learn-closeread/</a>
